Lord, give us strength.

1. It's ANIME. 

Anime: Japanese cartoons. Drawn. Inherently FICTION.
Doesn't matter HOW realistic the artist wants to make
it, it's still ART--not life.

2. What anime are you watching? Most I'm familiar with
(Samurai X, Rurouni Kenshin)take place in the Edo
period. No major wars occured during the Edo period.
Why would you walk around in armor if there weren't
battles to fight? Samurai wore armour when they needed
to, didn't when they didn't. 

3. I'm in the Army--I don't walk around all the time
with a helmet and flak vest on, even though that's
what I would wear if I went into combat. Same with
them. 

Apply a little common sense, and it all becomes clear.



Nate

--- Syun Ukiya <squartzph@...> wrote:
> why are some samurai wearing armor and some doesn't?
> the samurai 
> animes I've seen they hardly wear armor?
> 
>
